email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai - Steel Coils 12000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai under CFR terms. Could you provide a vessel offer and an initial freight rate? The laycan we are targeting is October 10-15.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai - Steel Coils 12000MT
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN STAR, which is currently open in Antwerp and can be positioned to Rotterdam for your laycan. The initial freight rate is $65/MT. The vessel has a DWT of 50000 and an LOA of 200m.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai - Steel Coils 12000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Laura,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $65/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you review this and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the expected loading window in Rotterdam?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai - Steel Coils 12000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

After reviewing the market, I can offer a revised rate of $60/MT. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. The loading window in Rotterdam is expected to be 3 days, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai - Steel Coils 12000MT - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can accept the rate of $60/MT and the demurrage rate of $20,000 per day. Please confirm the laycan as October 10-13 and proceed with the charter party.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Rotterdam to Shanghai - Steel Coils 12000MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
James,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan is confirmed as October 10-13. I will send the charter party for your review shortly.

Best,
Laura Smith
